title: Taps (1981) Tom Cruise + Sean Penn(Optional subs Swe+Eng)
description:
a.k.a.: 
Taps the movie - Taps, the Movie
The Siege at Bunker Hill: T.A.P.S
Taps
Taps* <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0083169/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0083169/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files: English, Swedish (Work in Windows Media Player etc.)

Great classic with a very young Tom Cruise as a trigger-happy military cadet (then only 19 years). Also one of the first films for Sean Penn (then 21) and Timothy Hutton (then 21). 
Really thought-provoking plot: How will a group of young men, heavily armed and trained for battle, react if their own home base comes under attack?

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. 

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x368, great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
